head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NICKERSON, VIRGINIA M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NICKERSON, VIRGINIA M.

block.p: NICKERSON-Virginia M. of Cold Spring Harbor on June 18, 2000. Beloved wife of Adams H. Nickerson. Cherished wife of the late Edgar Farrar Bateson. Dear mother of Douglas F. Bateson, Rosina B. Barker, Emily M. Bateson, and William M. Bateson. Loving grandmother of Maria, Hoyt, Farrar, Nathaniel, Taylor, and Eleanor. Cherished sister of Keith Moffat. Memorial services will be held Wednesday 11:00 a.m. at St. John's Episcopal Church, Cold Spring Harbor, New York. Donations may be made to the Children Aid Society, 105 E. 22 St, New York, NY 10010. A.L. Jacobsen Funeral Home Inc. Huntington, New York.
